overview.en: Virtual Investment Bank has introduced its own multi-year accumulation of three-dimensional security guarantee mechanism to build a new generation of financial service infrastructure and provide bank-level asset security services to investors. Introduce compliance process and professional services, connect with oneself or third-party investment and financing service providers, and provide users with investment and financing ecological services from chain to chain. It is a combination of mainstream finance and blockchain and a normative attempt of blockchain finance under supervision.
overview.zh: Virtual Investment Bank 引入了自身多年积累的立体安全保障机制，打造新一代的金融服务基础设施，提供给投资者银行级的资产安全服务。引入合规流程和专业服务，对接自身或第三方投融资服务商，为用户提供从链上到链下的投融资生态服务。是主流金融与区块链的一次结合，是区块链金融在监管下的规范性尝试。
